items.title: An update to the TF2 GameJolt Community Rules has been made.
items.content_html:
Due to a recent event, I have updated the rules on the TF2 GameJolt Community. The changes are the following:

  • Added a new rule, please check the rules page to see it.
  • Added a line at the bottom of the rules page that states that the community is also subject to the GameJolt Site Guidelines

Please read over the rules carefully. These changes were made to help ensure the safety of the community, and the members in it.
